Metal

  • About
  • Contributing
  • Tutorials
  • Colophon

Metal has been made possible by the earlier work done in Debox. Random frustration with the quirks of Scala specialization led to the current project.

The core subproject could be adapted to deal with off-heap memory, see for example:

  • LArray,
  • scala-offheap.

Last updated on March 22, 2016
